column2: Campbell Soup to switch to BPA-free cans by 2017 March 28 Campbell Soup Co
column4: said it would completely switch to cans that do not use the chemical bisphenol A (BPA) for their linings in North America by the middle of 2017.

column2: Facebook's Oculus starts shipping Rift virtual reality headset March 28 Virtual reality company Oculus started shipping its highly awaited Rift headsets from Monday
column3: about two years after the company was acquired by social media giant Facebook Inc.

column2: U.S. gives antitrust approval to GM's purchase of Cruise Automation March 28 General Motors Co has won U.S. antitrust approval for the  purchase of Silicon Valley startup Cruise Automation Inc
column3: the Federal Trade Commission said on Monday.

column2: Former Harman International executive pleads guilty to insider tradingFormer Harman International executive pleads guilty to insider trading A former Harman International Industries Inc executive admitted on Monday to insider trading in the company's stock just prior to the release of a stronger-than-expected quarterly earnings report.
